events.title: CSSConf.Asia
events.desc:
Bridging web design and implementation. Southeast-Asia's premier front-end and design conference hosting the international who-is-who of web stylists.

http://2015.cssconf.asia

events.title: CSSConf.Asia After Party
events.desc: Offical CSSConf.Asia after party for conference attendees

events.title: Haskell with Web Technologies
events.desc: Haskell.SG plans a special edition of a meetup that would be entirely devoted to making web applications with Haskell. This would include hosting Haskell code in the browser with GHCjs, interoperating with Web API portals, and more.

events.title: JSConf.Asia (Day 1)
events.desc:
It‘s a bit like TED just for web devs. JSConf.Asia hosts 20+ JavaScript and web pros over 2-days from around the world in an exciting and intimate environment.

http://2015.jsconf.asia

events.title: NodeBots - Sumo Bot Battles
events.desc: A day workshop where participants will learn how to build a simplebot with Arduino, servos and cardboard. They will then programme it using node.js.

events.title: JSConf.Asia (Day 2)
events.desc:
It‘s a bit like TED just for web devs. JSConf.Asia hosts 20+ JavaScript and web pros over 2-days from around the world in an exciting and intimate environment.

http://2015.jsconf.asia

events.title: JSConf.Asia After Party
events.desc: Offical JSConf.Asia after party for conference attendees

events.title: Rails Girls (DevFest.Asia Edition)
events.desc: Rails Girls is an initiative that provides a community for women to understand technology and to build their ideas.

events.title: WebAudio Hack Day
events.desc: Expect a whole day of sound hacking with the Web Audio spec author and Firefox coder Paul Adenot and New Zealands web audio musician Matt McKegg! Bring headsets and prepare for some serious beats!

events.title: KopiJS
events.desc: A casual and relaxing coffee/brunch hangout among all developers, designers, makers and like-minded people.

events.title: CSS Singapore Meetup
events.desc: Come to the first ever CSS Singapore! Featuring short talks to learn something new about the front end world. Whether you're a CSS veteran or are just starting out, there's something for you.

events.title: $50 for your DevFest.Asia desk
events.desc:
The Working Capitol gives you access to its beautiful space, Wi-Fi and community for the entire timespan of DevFest.Asia. It's also the venue for some of our other events. Hop by, sign up with your DevFest.Asia identification and enjoy!

http://www.theworkingcapitol.com

events.title: Free co-hacking at HSG
events.desc:
Built by and for geeks, nerds, inventors, engineers, and entrepreneurs, Hackerspace.SG is the Singapore hacker community's home, living room and laboratory. DevFest.Asia participants are most welcome.

http://hackerspace.sg
events.ticketinfo: Register at the entrance upon arrival

events.title: Free Impact Hub co-working
events.desc:
The Hub Singapore is Singapore’s largest community of entrepreneurs, creatives and techies. Come join us during DevFest.Asia for free co-working at our lovely, super new place. Desks only for registered visitors.

http://thehub.sg

events.title: $20 Day-Pass at The Co
events.desc:
The Co is an award-winning ecosystem of workspaces, and is home to a community of global businesses and digital companies. Please bring DevFest.Asia identification, and call 6595 6288 in advance. Includes all access hot-desk, WiFi + coffee/tea.

http://jointhe.co
events.ticketinfo: Register at the entrance upon arrival

events.title: $25 Day-Pass at Woolf Works
events.desc:
Woolf Works is a shared work space specifically for women, located on lively Joo Chiat Road, on the east coast of Singapore. Meet our great community of women to chat over coffee. Includes hot-desk, WiFi + coffee/tea.

http://www.woolfworks.sg
events.ticketinfo: Register at the entrance upon arrival (women only)

events.title: Free co-working at ACE
events.desc:
Visit the Action Community for Entrepreneurship (ACE), a private sector-led movement for entrepreneurs, by entrepreneurs. Located right at Singapore's entrepreneurial heart at one-north.

Check http://www.ace.sg/#calendar-of-events to look out for days without events.
events.ticketinfo: Register at the entrance upon arrival
